document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">Man </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">may </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">make </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c54ff">Remark </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">itself </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c54ff">quiet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">thing </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">may </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">furnish </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">Fuse </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">unto </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">Spark </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">dormant </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">nature </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">lain </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Let </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">divide </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">skill </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Let </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">discourse </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">care </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">Powder </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">exists </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">Charcoal </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Before </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">exists </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">Fire </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: A man may make a remark
